title: Senior Software Engineer (Front-End) - US-Remote NEW!
full_description: Join us as we pursue our disruptive new vision to make machine data accessible, usable and valuable to everyone. We are a company filled with people who are passionate about our product and seek to deliver the best experience for our customers. At Splunk, we're committed to our work, customers, having fun and most importantly to each other's success. Learn more about Splunk careers and how you can become a part of our journey!We are looking for an extraordinary front-end engineer to help ship a next generation design system built in React. You thrive in a dynamic environment and have a consistent record of software delivery. This role requires deep collaboration with our design systems design team, accessibility team, as well as with our application developers, product designers, and product managers.Responsibilities:While you can work from any Splunk office, or be remote, this team's working hours are in the PST timezone, and you'll be expected to have your working hours line up with that.Developing and maintaining design system components, modules, and styles.Collaborating with our Design Systems and product teams to ensure all work is "on system", built to a high degree of quality, and highly accessible.Spot checking applications for fit and finish of our work.Documenting our system for our developers and other downstream consumers.Being a champion for our design system across all communication channelsMentoring junior developersRequirements:5+ years of experience building JavaScript applications and shared componentsDeep expertise in HTML and CSSSolid experience with React and Typescript. Testing frameworks a plusGreat communication skillsGood eye for detail, design experience a plusKnowledge of accessibility basicsWhile you can work from any Splunk office, or be remote, this team's working hours are in the PST timezone, and you'll be expected to have your working hours line up with that.What We Offer You:A constant stream of new things for you to learn. We're always exploring new technology, bringing in OSS projects and contributing back, and exploring new technologies.A set of uncommonly hardworking and dedicated peersA stable, collaborative and supportive work environment.We don't expect people to work 12-hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and dedication, and believe that balance helps cultivate an extraordinary environment.We value diversity at our company. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or any other applicable legally protected characteristics in the location in which the candidate is applying.For job positions in San Francisco, CA, and other locations where required, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.Thank you for your interest in Splunk!
